title: Victory Speech
description: Read the winner's concession speech praising their incredible skills

title: Dramatic Bow
description: Perform an overly dramatic bow while declaring the winner as your superior

title: Victory Dance
description: Perform a 30-second victory dance for the winner

title: Compliment Marathon
description: Give the winner 5 genuine compliments about their gaming skills

title: Royal Treatment
description: Address the winner as 'Your Majesty' for the next 5 minutes

title: Silly Walk
description: Walk like a penguin for 30 seconds

title: Song Serenade
description: Sing 'Happy Birthday' to the winner (even if it's not their birthday)

title: Magic Trick
description: Attempt to perform a magic trick using household items

title: Snack Fetcher
description: Get the winner their favorite snack or drink

title: Joke Time
description: Tell your best (or worst) joke to make the winner laugh

title: Superhero Pose
description: Strike and hold a superhero pose while the winner takes a photo

title: Poetry Recital
description: Compose and recite a short poem about the winner's victory

title: Animal Sounds
description: Make animal sounds for 20 seconds (winner chooses the animal)

title: Victory Crown
description: Create a 'crown' from household items and place it on the winner's head

title: Accent Challenge
description: Speak in a funny accent for the next 2 minutes

title: Victory Lap
description: Do a victory lap around the room while cheering for the winner

title: Talent Show
description: Perform your hidden talent (or make one up) for everyone

title: Photo Booth
description: Take 5 silly photos with the winner making funny faces

title: Victory Chant
description: Create and perform a chant celebrating the winner's success

title: Cleanup Duty
description: Clean up any mess from the games while humming a happy tune
